languages.text: "Если ты падешь ниц, я милосердно позволю Соломону прикончить тебя быстро".
"If you grovel before me, I will be merciful and let Solomorne finish you off quickly."
languages.original_text: "Если ты падешь ниц, я милосердно позволю Соломону прикончить тебя быстро".

traits.locale_text: "If you grovel before me, I will be merciful and let Solomorne finish you off quickly."
"If you grovel before me, I will be merciful and let Solomorne finish you off quickly."
"If you grovel before me, I will be merciful and let Solomorne finish you off quickly."
"If you grovel before me, I will be merciful and let Solomorne finish you off quickly."
"If you grovel before me, I will be merciful and let Solomorne finish you off quickly."

languages.text: “如果你愿意跪在我面前，求我大发慈悲，我可以让索罗蒙给你个痛快。”
languages.original_text: "If you grovel before me, I will be merciful and let Solomorne finish you off quickly."

traits.locale_text: “如果你愿意跪在我面前，求我大发慈悲，我可以让索罗蒙给你个痛快。”

languages.text: «Si se postra ante mí, tendré piedad y haré que Solomorne le procure una muerte rápida».
languages.original_text: "If you grovel before me, I will be merciful and let Solomorne finish you off quickly."

traits.locale_text: «Si se postra ante mí, tendré piedad y haré que Solomorne le procure una muerte rápida».

languages.text: "Eğer önümde yerlerde sürünürsen merhamet gösterir ve Solomorne'un işini çabucak bitirmesine izin veririm."
languages.original_text: "If you grovel before me, I will be merciful and let Solomorne finish you off quickly."

traits.locale_text: "Eğer önümde yerlerde sürünürsen merhamet gösterir ve Solomorne'un işini çabucak bitirmesine izin veririm."

languages.text: 「もし{mf|俺|私}の前にひれ伏すなら、慈悲を与えて、ソロモーンに迅速に始末させてやってもいい」
languages.original_text: "If you grovel before me, I will be merciful and let Solomorne finish you off quickly."

traits.locale_text: 「もし{mf|俺|私}の前にひれ伏すなら、慈悲を与えて、ソロモーンに迅速に始末させてやってもいい」

languages.text: « Prosternez-vous devant moi, et je ferai preuve de clémence. Je demanderai à Solomorne de vous achever rapidement. »
languages.original_text: "If you grovel before me, I will be merciful and let Solomorne finish you off quickly."

traits.locale_text: « Prosternez-vous devant moi, et je ferai preuve de clémence. Je demanderai à Solomorne de vous achever rapidement. »

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr vor mir buckelt, bin ich gnädig und erlaube Solomorne, Euch schnell zu töten."
languages.original_text: "If you grovel before me, I will be merciful and let Solomorne finish you off quickly."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr vor mir buckelt, bin ich gnädig und erlaube Solomorne, Euch schnell zu töten."
